title: Red Hat Customer Portal Labs Newsletter - FY2018Q1

newApps.title: Red Hat Product Certificates
newApps.desc: The Red Hat Product Certificates application helps you retrieve and install product certificate files that are required for Red Hat Subscription Management (RHSM) to recognize Red Hat products installed on your system.

newApps.title: Red Hat Network (RHN) System List Exporter
newApps.desc: This app can retrieve information about systems that are still registered to Red Hat Network Classic (RHN) to assist with your migration to Red Hat Subscription Management (RHSM).

kudos.author: Joseph Stephens (Customer, Oncor Electric Delivery Company)
kudos.content: This (Red Hat Virtualization Agent (virt-who) Configuration Helper) is great! It helped with a confusing multi esxi environment with hundreds of esx and thousands of hosts. Great Work!!!!!! Thank you to whomever wrote this little tool!

kudos.author: Anuja Janorkar (Customer Support Specialist, Red Hat)
kudos.content: The Red Hat Product Certificates app looks amazing. I tried for RHSCL and few other certificates. The files were generated under the required directory after executing the script. This will definitely help the customers and will reduce the "certificate missing" case volume. xmeng++ dzhao++ you rock!

kudos.author: Marina Kalinin (Senior Software Maintenance Engineer Sbr-Virt, Red Hat)
kudos.content: Thanks to all the folks working and contributing to the tool. Specifically Yunfeng, Dong, Roman, Javier and the rest of you!
